variable.saved: Variable with RDC-ID {{ id }} was saved successfully!
variable.not-saved: Variable with RDC-ID {{ id }} has not been saved!
variable.missing-id: Variable {{ index }} does not contain a RDC-ID and has not been saved:
variable.upload-terminated: Finished upload of {{ total }} Variables with {{ errors }} errors.

validResponses.uniqueValue: The value has to be unique within the valid responses.

totalAbsoluteFrequency.not-null: The total absolute frequency must not be empty!

totalValidAbsoluteFrequency.not-null: The total valid absolute frequency must not be empty!

totalValidRelativeFrequency.not-null: The total valid relative frequency must not be empty!

missings.uniqueCode: The code has to be unique within the missings.

expression.not-empty: The filter expression must not be empty!
expression.size: The max length of the filter expression is 128 signs.

description.i18n-string-size: The max length of the filter description is 2048 signs.

expressionLanguage.not-empty: The filter expression language  must not be empty!
expressionLanguage.validFilterExpressionLanguage: The filter expression language is not valid. Valid is: SpEL and Stata.

generationDetails.notEmptyGenerationDetailsDescriptionOrRu: The rule or the description of a generation rule must not be empty! Both can be set, too.
generationDetails.ruleExpressionLanguageAndRuleFilledOrEmp: Both, the rule and the rule expression language, have to be filled or empty.

description.i18n-string-size: The max length of the generation rule description of the variable is 2048 signs.

rule.size: The max length of the rule is 1048576 signs.

ruleExpressionLanguage.validRuleExpressionLanguage: The rule expression language is not valid. Valid is: R and Stata.

code.not-null: The code of a missing must be not empty!

label.i18n-string-size: The max length of the label of a missing is 128 signs.

absoluteFrequency.not-null: The absolute frequency of a missing must not be empty!

relativeFrequency.not-null: The relative frequency of a missing must not be empty!

label.i18n-string-size: The max length of the label of a valid response is 2048 signs.

absoluteFrequency.not-null: The absolute frequency of a valid response must not be empty!

relativeFrequency.not-null: The relative frequency of a valid response must not be empty!

value.size: The max length of the value of a valid response is 32 signs.
value.not-null: The value of a valid response must not be empty!

validRelativeFrequency.not-null: The valid relative frequency of a valid response must not be empty!

variable.validVariableName: The RDC-ID of the Variable is not valid for the Pattern: RDCID-VariableName.
variable.uniqueVariableNameInProject: The name of the Variable is already used within this Project.
variable.mandatoryScaleLevelForNumericDataType: The Scale Level of a numeric Variable must not be empty or is must be empty on a string data type!
variable.validResponseValueMustBeANumberOnNumeric: If the variable has a numeric data type, the values of valid responses have to be numeric!
variable.validResponseValueMustBeAnIsoDateOnDateD: If the variable has a date data type, the values of valid responses have to be matchable by the ISO Standard 8601.

id.not-empty: The RDC-ID of the Variable must not be empty!
id.size: The max length of the RDC-ID is 128 signs.
id.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs, german umlauts, ÃŸ and space, underscore and minus for the RDC-ID.

dataType.not-null: The data type of the Variable must not be empty!
dataType.validDataType: The value for data type is not valid. Allowed values in english: string, numerisch. Allowed values in english: string, numeric.
dataType.validScaleLevel: The values for Scale Level are not valid. Allowed values in german: ordinal, nominal, kontinuierlich. Allowed values in english: ordinal, nominal, continous.

name.not-empty: The Name of the Variable must not be empty!
name.size: The max length of the name is 32 signs.
name.pattern: Use only alphanumeric signs and underscore for the name.

label.not-null: The label of the Variable must not be empty!
label.i18n-string-size: The max length of the label is 128 signs.
label.atLeastOneLanguage: At least an english or a german label must be given!

description.i18n-string-size: The max length of the description is 2048 signs.

accessWays.not-empty: The list of access ways of a variable needs min. one element and must not be empty!
accessWays.validAccessWays: The values of access ways are invalid. Valid values are: suf, cuf and remote.

ids.not-empty: The Variable must be assigned to at least one Data Set!
The Variable must be assigned to at least one Survey!

postValidation.variableHasInvalidSurveyId: The Variable {{id}} references an unknown Survey ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
postValidation.variableHasInvalidDataSetId: The Variable {{id}} references an unknown Data Set ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
postValidation.variableIdIsNotInInvalidVariablesPanel: The Variable {{id}} references an unknown Panel Variable ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
postValidation.variableHasInvalidAtomicQuestionId: The Variable {{id}} references an unknown Atomic Question ({{toBereferenzedId}}).
